tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: From wanting to be a parent, to a happy mother today, I am always comfortable in consulting the doctor. Be it from investigations, prescriptions, procedures, small doubts etc. She takes utmost care in communicating things to her patients. In addition to this, her empathy and approach towards handling medical situations is admirable. I will strongly recommend my friends and acquaintances to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We are happy with doctor and her explanation but extremely disappointed with charges they have collected for testings and meidcal lab expenses and they are collecting more than what other labs collect like Tapadia and Vijaya dignostic centers so visitthe doctor but never do testing there

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Hi I am Divya doctor cares the patient very well and she explain each query in detail she is very friendly and doctor was professional on explaining health concerns she was eagerly listening to all the fears and worries expressed by me .Thank u doctor I would recommend this doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr.Tejashwini is very friendly *** ************* doctor in Fertility and Gynecology . I met her during my Wife's pregnancy.  Answers to every questions you may have. She makes you feel at ease and gives 100% supportive cooperation  .  Truly do appreciate her excellent care she gives to her patients.  Polite greeting at front desk, wait time was short.  
I would highly recommend any women to meet her and discuss their issues with her .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: we visited  so many hospitals  ,but she is very friendly, after so many years of marriage  when we lost all our Hope of having children Dr.tejaswini mam has done parenthood  dreams of infertile couples come true.we met her immediately and after thorough examination  of us she started our treatment and we are blessed  with a baby girl and expenses  are also very reasonable. couples who have infertility  problems  definitely meet her she makes your dream  come true.The treatment was on time as required we recommend this doctor  to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I heard about the doctor from a family friend of ours... I am so glad that I came to know about her and visited her for  my  pregnancy and  am now blessed with healthy baby girl after 3 miscarriages with gestational diabetes. The most distinguished feature about her is that she is most focused on her treatment with  good out comes on high risk pregnancies.  I would strongly recommend her. Thank you madam for all your efforts and patience.

I remember she coming on Sunday just for me.  Such is her dedication towards work. Best doctor. I strongly recommend visiting doc's office once if anyone is facing similar. issues as mine...
